submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=1)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=1)
        m -= 1
        n -= 1
        h = v = 1
        ans = res = i = j = 0
        while i < m and j < n:
            a, b = horizontalCut[i], verticalCut[j]
            if a > b:
                ans += a * v
                h += 1
                i += 1
            else:
                ans += b * h
                v += 1
                j += 1
        while i < m:
            res += horizontalCut[i]
            i += 1
        ans += res * v
        res = 0
        while j < n:
            res += verticalCut[j]
            j += 1
        ans += res * h
        return ans
